messages.title: Strong Leadership. A Clear Economic Plan. A Better, More Secure Future.
messages.content: THE CONSERVATIVES ARE COMMITTED TO SECURING A BETTER FUTURE FOR YOU, YOUR FAMILY AND BRITAIN.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Britain that lives within its means
keyPolicies.policyDescription: So we can clear our debts to keep our economy strong and healthy for the future.
Where there's a job and training for everyone who wants it, and a welfare system that ensures it always pays to work.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Britain that offers financial security and rewards work
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Where taxes are low and families get help with childcare costs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Britain that gives every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Where every community has a good school with high standards.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Britain where everyone can have a home of their own
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Where housing is affordable for those who've worked hard and saved.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Britain that offers everyone security in retirement
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Where those who have worked hard all their lives get the help they deserve in later life.

housing.content: Where housing is affordable for those who've worked hard and saved.

images.caption: Iain Duncan Smith visits M6 Link Road. Infrastructure is key for jobs and investment into the area.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Exclusive: David Morris sets out his plans for the next five years for Morecambe and Lunesdale.
